keys[]
formParams.description: Request specific measures by their keystring. Supported measures include:

formParams.name: start_at
formParams.description: The start date for the time period. If a time is provided, it will be ignored.

formParams.name: end_at
formParams.description: The end date for the time period. If a time is provided, it will be ignored.

tag_accounts[id]: When `tag_accounts` is one of the requested keys, you must provide a tag ID to obtain the measure of how many accounts used that hashtag in at least one status within the given time period.
formParams.name: tag_accounts
tag_uses
formParams.description: tag_uses[id]: When `tag_uses` is one of the requested keys, you must provide a tag ID to obtain the measure of how many statuses used that hashtag within the given time period.

tag_servers[id]: When `tag_servers` is one of the requested keys, you must provide a tag ID to obtain the measure of how many servers used that hashtag in at least one status within the given time period.
formParams.name: tag_servers

formParams.description: instance_accounts[domain]: When `instance_accounts` is one of the requested keys, you must provide a remote domain to obtain the measure of how many accounts have been discovered from that server within the given time period.
formParams.name: instance_accounts
instance_media_attachments
formParams.description: instance_media_attachments[domain]: When `instance_media_attachments` is one of the requested keys, you must provide a remote domain to obtain the measure of how much space is used by media attachments from that server within the given time period.

instance_reports[domain]: When `instance_reports` is one of the requested keys, you must provide a remote domain to obtain the measure of how many reports have been filed against accounts from that server within the given time period.
formParams.name: instance_reports
instance_statuses
formParams.description: instance_statuses[domain]: When `instance_statuses` is one of the requested keys, you must provide a remote domain to obtain the measure of how many statuses originate from that server within the given time period.

formParams.name: instance_follows
formParams.description: instance_follows[domain]: When `instance_follows` is one of the requested keys, you must provide a remote domain to obtain the measure of how many follows were performed on accounts from that server by local accounts within the given time period.

instance_followers[domain]: When `instance_followers` is one of the requested keys, you must provide a remote domain to obtain the measure of how many follows were performed by accounts from that server on local accounts within the given time period.
formParams.name: instance_followers

admin::measures.description: Obtain quantitative metrics about the server.

admin::dimensions.description: Obtain qualitative metrics about the server.

formParams.name: tag_servers

tag_languages[id]: When `tag_languages` is one of the requested keys, you must provide a trending tag ID to obtain information about which languages are posting the tag.

formParams.description: If the account is remote, should the report be forwarded to the remote admin? Defaults to false.

Specify if the report is due to `spam`, `violation` of enumerated instance rules, or some `other` reason. Defaults to `other`. Will be set to `violation` if `rule_ids[]` is provided (regardless of any category value you provide).
